item.title: Elizabeth Olsen's New Dystopian Sci-Fi Movie Revealed In The Assessment Trailer
item.description: The Assessment trailer reveals Elizabeth Oslen's new dystopian sci-fi movie about a couple whose attempt to have a child unravels into a nightmare.

item.title: Rule Breakers Clip Sees The First All-Girls Robotics Team From Afghanistan Find Their Funding
item.description: Exclusive: ScreenRant presents a clip from Rule Breakers, the story of the first all-girls robotics team from Afghanistan, inspired by real events.
